languages.text: Офицер угрюмо опускает дубину и отдает вам честь — пора возвращаться домой. А поседевшая блюстительница смотрит вам вслед со смесью ужаса и восхищения. В молитве она бьется лбом о металлический пол, обещая и дальше исправно нести свою службу во славу Вашей Светлости, да охранит вас Бог-Император от невзгод!

traits.locale_text: Офицер угрюмо опускает дубину и отдает вам честь — пора возвращаться домой. А поседевшая стражница смотрит вам вслед со смесью ужаса и восхищения. В молитве она бьется лбом о металлический пол, обещая и дальше исправно нести свою службу во славу Вашей Светлости, да охранит вас Бог-Император от невзгод!

languages.text: Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes you. Time to go home. And the enforcer, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after you in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of {mf|Your Lord|Your Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor shield you from adversity!
languages.original_text: Офицер угрюмо опускает дубину и отдает вам честь — пора возвращаться домой. А поседевшая блюстительница смотрит вам вслед со смесью ужаса и восхищения. В молитве она бьется лбом о металлический пол, обещая и дальше исправно нести свою службу во славу Вашей Светлости, да охранит вас Бог-Император от невзгод!

traits.locale_text: Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes you. Time to go home. And the guard, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after you in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor protect you from adversity!

Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes you. Time to go home. And the guard, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after you in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor protect you from adversity!

Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes you. Time to go home. And the guard, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after you in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor shield you from adversity!

Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes the Rogue Trader. Time to go home. And the enforcer, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after the Rogue Trader in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor shield {mf|him|her} from adversity!

Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes the Rogue Trader. Time to go home. And the enforcer, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after the Rogue Trader in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor shield {mf|him|her} from adversity!

Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes you. Time to go home. And the enforcer, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after you in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of {mf|Your Lord|Your Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor shield you from adversity!

languages.text: 军官脸色阴沉地放下了棍子，朝你敬了个礼。是时候回家了。那位执法者一部分头发已经花白。她敬畏地盯着你，跪在地上，额头紧紧地贴在金属地板上，发誓会为你的荣耀继续竭诚尽忠。同时，她也向神皇祈祷，希望神皇可以保佑你远离险境！
languages.original_text: Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes you. Time to go home. And the enforcer, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after you in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of {mf|Your Lord|Your Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor shield you from adversity!

traits.locale_text: 军官脸色阴沉地放下了棍子，朝你敬了个礼。是时候回家了。那位执法者一部分头发已经花白。她敬畏地盯着你，跪在地上，额头紧紧地贴在金属地板上，发誓会为你的荣耀继续竭诚尽忠。同时，她也向神皇祈祷，希望神皇可以保佑你远离险境！

languages.text: El oficial, sombrío, baja la porra y se cuadra frente a ti. Es hora de volver a casa. Y la guardia, con canas nuevas, te observa con admiración. Lleva la frente al suelo metálico en una oración, jurando continuar con su fiel servicio por la gloria de su señor{mf||a}, ¡que el Dios Emperador {mf|le|la} proteja de toda adversidad!
languages.original_text: Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes you. Time to go home. And the enforcer, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after you in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of {mf|Your Lord|Your Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor shield you from adversity!

traits.locale_text: El oficial, sombrío, baja la porra y se cuadra frente a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Es hora de volver a casa. Y la guardia, con canas nuevas, observa con admiración a{mf|l| la} Comerciante. Lleva la frente al suelo metálico en una oración, jurando continuar con su fiel servicio por la gloria de su señor{mf||a}, ¡que el Dios Emperador {mf|le|la} proteja de toda adversidad!

languages.text: 士官は重々しく棍棒を下ろすと、あなたに敬礼する。家に帰るときだ。髪の一部が白髪になった執行官は、恐れおののきあなたを見つめる。執行官は金属の床を叩き、閣下の栄光のために忠実に奉仕し続けることを誓った。神帝陛下が逆境から身を守ってくださらんことを。
languages.original_text: Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes you. Time to go home. And the enforcer, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after you in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of {mf|Your Lord|Your Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor shield you from adversity!

traits.locale_text: 士官は重々しく棍棒を下ろすと、ローグトレーダーに敬礼する。家に帰るときだ。髪の一部が白髪になった執行官は、恐れおののきローグトレーダーを見つめる。執行官は金属の床を叩き、閣下の栄光のために忠実に奉仕し続けることを誓った。神帝陛下が逆境から身を守ってくださらんことを。

languages.text: Mit grimmiger Miene senkt der Offizier seine Keule und salutiert vor dir. Es wird Zeit, nach Hause zu gehen. Und die Enforcerin blickt dir ehrfürchtig und mit einigen grauen Haaren mehr nach. Sie schlägt betend immer wieder den Kopf auf den Metallboden und schwört, {mf|seiner Lordschaft|ihrer Ladyschaft}, möge der Gottimperator dich vor jedem Schaden bewahren, weiterhin treu zu dienen!
languages.original_text: Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes you. Time to go home. And the enforcer, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after you in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of {mf|Your Lord|Your Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor shield you from adversity!

traits.locale_text: Mit grimmiger Miene senkt der Offizier seine Keule und salutiert vor dir. Es wird Zeit, nach Hause zu gehen. Und die Enforcerin blickt dir ehrfürchtig und mit einigen grauen Haaren mehr nach. Sie schlägt betend immer wieder den Kopf auf den Metallboden und schwört, {mf|seiner Lordschaft|ihrer Ladyschaft}, möge der Gottimperator dich vor jedem Schaden bewahren, weiterhin treu zu dienen!

Mit grimmiger Miene senkt der Offizier seine Keule und salutiert vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Zeit, nach Hause zu gehen. Und die Enforcerin starrt {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ehrfürchtig hinterher, mit einigen neuen grauen Haaren auf dem Kopf. Sie schlägt betend immer wieder den Kopf auf den Metallboden und schwört, {mf|seiner Lordschaft|ihrer Ladyschaft}, möge der Gottimperator {mf|ihn|sie} vor jedem Schaden bewahren, weiterhin treu zu dienen!

languages.text: L'officier baisse sa matraque et vous salue d'un air sombre. Il est temps de rentrer. La prévote, qui a gagné quelques cheveux blancs, vous fixe avec admiration. Elle se cogne le front contre le sol de métal pour prier, jurant de poursuivre son service avec loyauté pour la gloire de Sa Seigneurie, que l'Empereur-Dieu vous protège de l'adversité !
languages.original_text: Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes you. Time to go home. And the enforcer, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after you in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of {mf|Your Lord|Your Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor shield you from adversity!

traits.locale_text: L'officier baisse sa matraque et salue {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} d'un air sombre. Il est temps de rentrer. L'exécutante, qui a gagné quelques cheveux blancs, fixe {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} avec admiration. Elle se cogne le front contre le sol de métal pour prier, jurant de poursuivre son service avec loyauté pour la gloire de Sa Seigneurie, que l'Empereur-Dieu {mf|le|la} protège de l'adversité !

languages.text: Subay, hüzünle copunu indirip sana selam duruyor. Artık eve dönme zamanı. Saçlarına bir anda aklar düşen infazcı, hayranlıkla ardından bakıyor. Metal zemine başını vurup dua ediyor, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin şanı için sadık hizmetine devam edeceğine yemin ediyor. Tanrı İmparator seni kötülüklerden korusun!
languages.original_text: Sombrely, the officer lowers his club and salutes you. Time to go home. And the enforcer, some of her hair freshly grey, stares after you in awe. She beats her brow on the metal floor in prayer, vowing to keep rendering faithful service for the glory of {mf|Your Lord|Your Lady}ship, may the God-Emperor shield you from adversity!
